title: SAMSUNG Galaxy S20 FE (Cloud Navy, 128 GB)  (8 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset (Non Removable Battery Included), Travel Adapter, USB Cable, User Manual
product_specification.Sensors: Accelerometer, Fingerprint Sensor, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Hall Sensor, RGB Light Sensor, Virtual Proximity Sensing
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty Provided by the Manufacturer from Date of Purchase

product_description.A Smartphone You Will Love: Be it for gaming, clicking photos, recording videos, or checking your social media feeds, the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE smartphone helps you do all these and more. Stylish and elegant, this smartphone from Samsung is sure to be every gadget freak’s must-have device.
product_description.Stunning Colors: The Samsung Galaxy S20 FE comes in a myriad of stunning colors and finishes, so you can flaunt this stunning device wherever you go. From classic and subtle hues to bold and eye-catchy colors, you can buy this smartphone in the color of your choice.
product_description.Infinity-O Display: Get ready to enjoy an immersive and cinematic viewing experience as this smartphone comes with a 16.40 cm (6.5) Full HD+ Infinity-O display. Moreover, its narrow bezels, flat edges, and a small punch hole for the camera offer you a larger viewing area, making it a delight to binge-watch TV shows, capture images, play games, and more.
product_description.Triple Rear Camera: The rear camera setup of this smartphone comprises three cameras (12 MP + 12 MP + 8 MP) so that you can capture stunning and professional-like photos of landscapes, food, and people with ease. The 12 MP Ultra Wide Camera and the 12 MP Wide-angle Camera let you capture a larger view of landscapes and cityscapes. The 8 MP Telephoto Camera offers up to 3x Optical Zoom capabilities for close-up shots.
product_description.30x Space Zoom Feature: Thanks to the combination of up to 3x Optical Zoom and up to 30x Super Resolution Zoom, you can easily capture close-up images of a subject/object even when you’re at a distance.
product_description.Capture Images Even in the Dark: You can capture stunning pictures even in dimly lit environments (Night Mode turned on), thanks to the dual-pixel sensor and enhanced camera AI of the rear camera setup. The dual-pixel sensor helps add more light to the images, so your shots are clear and vivid. It also simultaneously captures multiple frames, thereby processing the images into a single clear night-time photo.
product_description.Single Take Feature: With the Single Take feature, this smartphone offers you multiple photo and video options, helping you create stunning content for your social media accounts. All you have to do is, shoot a particular scene for about 15 seconds, and let the smartphone convert them into videos, photos, and more. You can find them in the smartphone’s Gallery app.
product_description.32 MP Front Camera: Step up your selfie and vlog game as this smartphone comes with a 32 MP front camera. Every image that you capture and every video that you record using the front camera will be clear and vivid.
product_description.Easy Connectivity: This smartphone supports LTE networks, with speeds of up to 1.6 Gbps, so you can enjoy a seamless browsing and streaming experience. Moreover, thanks to Wi-Fi 6 connectivity, you can achieve fast data speeds, with low latency, even if you’re in a crowded area. So, irrespective of whether you’re connected via the mobile network or Wi-Fi, you can play online games or stream videos from the Web while experiencing minimal lag.
product_description.Fast Refresh Rates: This smartphone from Samsung features a Super AMOLED display that has a refresh rate of up to 120 Hz, so you can enjoy a fast and smooth scrolling experience. So, whether you’re browsing through the day’s tweets on Twitter or scrolling through Instagram feeds, you can smoothly scroll through them without experiencing screen stuttering.
product_description.Long-lasting Battery: Equipped with a massive 4500 mAh battery, this Samsung smartphone lets you chat with your friends, play games, listen to music, watch videos, and do more in a day before it has to be charged again.
product_description.Powerful Processor: From switching between applications to live streaming sports matches, this smartphone offers smooth and powerful performance at all times, thanks to its octa-core processor and 8 GB of RAM. This smartphone also comes with the enhanced NPU which helps take its performance to another level.
product_description.Large Storage Space: This smartphone offers a large internal storage space of up to 128 GB, so you can store multiple photos, videos, and more on it. Moreover, if you still run out of space, you can easily enhance its storage (up to 1 TB) via a microSD card (sold separately).
product_description.Water-resistant Feature: This smartphone is IP68 rated, making it resistant to water splashes and dust. So, even if it starts to drizzle while capturing videos, this phone will not get damaged.

review:
I am the Samsung lover and using Samsung from last 10 years.
Before S20FE I was using Samsung Galaxy J8 which was quite remarkable phone.
S20FE is the beast in mid range class.
📷 quite impressive specially with 30x zoom.
🔋 Battery is a small problem which can be resolved by setting your phone up.
Display: Samsung brand is known for its Camera and Display so you can feel amazing picture quality.
Sound: Dual speakers 🔊 will give you a surrounding sound.
Storage: with 8 GB RAM & 128 GB space now you can store as much data as you want.
Overall Best phone you can have in this price range 😊😊😊😊
Go for it...

Display and Camera have top notch quality.

Battery was an issue during the setup. Once my phone was completely set up with all the apps, now the back up has improved
*Tip : Put your phone in Medium Power Saving Mode and you are good to go.
I get one day battery backup with normal usage.
*Note : I don't play games on this device since it is my work phone. Rest of the business apps, calls and camera is used regularly.

Performance is quite okay. Nothing to complain there.

Build quality is great. Just that the back is plastic. But the sides and front seems solid.

It is a 4G phone so do keep that in mind.

Currently on Android 10 and won't be upgrading it since I have experienced that upgrading the phone will actually slow it down and drain the battery.

This is a good midrange phone and I do recommend this.
Battery can be optimised. Performance is okay. Camera and display is best in class.

P.S. Do not compare it with iPhone. I saw people comparing this phone with iPhone 11/12 on YouTube. Please... this phone comes nowhere. I have iPhone 11 and it is better than this device in all the possible ways.

Display:
The display has a Super Amoled Panel. It has a fast refresh rate of 120hz. The colors are saturated as usual in a Super Amoled panel. The display is very bright as well. It is very smooth. But there is always stutter because of the Adaptive Refresh Rate.

UI:
Packed of features. There is no doubt that Samsung is one of the best UI out there for Android.

Battery:
The phone has 4500mah. Easily lasts a day. Could last even longer if used in 60hz. The phone supports upto 25w charging. It also supports reverse charging. It even supports reverse wireless charging!!

Performance: A top of the line processor by Samsung. Would've been better if the indian version had gotten the Snapdragon 865 chipset. But the 5g Version does have SD 865 but it is much more costlier.

Camera:
The camera sure is 12MP but it takes much more details than expected by a 12MP camera. It is a very capable capable unit under bright environments. But you can see lots of noise in dark environments.

Display is good , fingerprint sensor is unaccurate most of the time , performance is good for normal usage but not at all good for gaming.. can't play COD for more than 5 mins.. battrey life is the worst part of this phone... Camera is Very Good .. Don't buy this phone now
Great delivery and awesome condition with best market price very much satisfied

Go for Qualcom Smapdragon processor(5g) because exynos processor warmth up a little bit more but not heat up like an iron box.
Due to the warm from processor. the processor under clock the performance for the better management of warmth.
Other than that it is a very good phone.
Camera 5/5.
Display 5/5.
Design 5/5.
Processor 4/5.
Build quality 5/5.
Suggestions = if you are interested in gaming with the exynos not recommended go for Qualcom Smapdragon (5g) version

Been using the Phone for about a month. Till now there haven't been any issue with the phone but when you buy do keep in mind that it is not a gaming phone.
Playing games on this phone will make you feel bad about your purchase. Rest using heavy apps like Adobe rush and other video editing app will not be an issue.
This model has Exynos 990, it drains battery super fast and you might have to charge phone twice a day.
Cons:
1. Battery drains fast.
2. Fixed focus in camera.
3. It supports 25W charging but comes with 15W charger.
4. No headphone jack and comes with no type-c to headphone jack adaptor.
5. Heating problem.

Pros:
1. Fully water proof.(IPX78 certified).
2. Powerful Processor.
3. Camera is super good.

Absolutely top product from samsung and I bought this for camara actually and to tell you the truth it didn't disappoint me at all. Exposure and colours are great even in low light. I have not tested it in daylight but seeing its perfotmance in room and in low light I am sure it can beat any phone in terms of camara quality. Price wise it is just half of iphone 12 pro and perormance wise it is great. Processer, look wise it feels premium, no doubt.

Pros
1 rear camera is just great with space zoom you will have alot of fun
2 display is super smooth at 120hz
3 performance is great
4 samsung dex is just amazing
5 face lock is just super fast
6 and got all the premium flagship touches

Cons
1 front camera isn't good its average
2 battery backup is not up to the mark

The mobile is great for one who is looking a flagship level device with a samsungs trust and big service network
Overall a solid daily driver with good cameras, great display and above average battery life! However, had expected better performance from the camera set up!

I have owned this model since it was launched in India.

My biggest concern has been battery life. I have been extremely disappointed with it as I wasn't able to make it last through the day. The system needs a month or more to understand my usage and optimise battery usage.

I am always (and I mean all the time) on Bluetooth and WiFi as I work from home. I listen to music all the time. The phone last 6 hours on average. This is far better than the battery life I had at the beginning.

I cannot talk about the camera much as I rarely use it. It's serviceable.

The screen auto brightness setting is very aggressive sometimes. Dims the screen when it needs to be bright.

The fingerprint scanner is better but becomes unresponsive sometimes. Face recognition is pathetic.

Software is solid. I have Android 11 and things have gotten better.

Would I recommend it to people? Absolutely not for 41k. It's a phone that should be sold for 35k. It becomes a compelling buy at that point.

I would give this phone 3.5 stars out of 5. I have given it a liberal 4 stars here.

It is a good mobile with decent battery life.
In the beginning the battery dies fast, but after a few days it ges better. I think because of all the updates the battery gets drained very fast.

pros.16.40 cm (6.5) Full HD+ Infinity-O displ: The full HD+ infinity-o display of this phone has a super amoled panel and a fast refresh rate of 20hz to give an immersive and cinematic viewing experience. The display is very bright with rich colors.
pros.Camera: The triple rear camera and 32MP front camera setup is good and captures vivid pictures. The camera setup also helps capture stunning pictures at night.

cons.4500 mAh Battery: This phone comes with just a 4500 mAh battery which is not at all acceptable at this price segment. The battery drains fast and do not give a long lasting backup.
cons.Heating issue: There are a lot of heating issues with battery as well as camera of this phone.

summary.verdict: The SAMSUNG Galaxy S20 FE is a good pick for Samsung lovers as it comes with a premium display and an awesome camera setup. Not recommended if long lasting phone is the requirement.
summary.Additional Information: Dolby Atmos, Dual speaker, OTG support.
